page.title: 10INDUSTRY
page.content: { Industries}in this area include Govan Shipbuilders, which has gradually declined, the workforce reduced by thousands, although the {industry}is beginning to pick up new orders, such as a Â£40 million ferry. The area also includes Hillington {Industrial}Estate where there is a Rolls Royce plant, furniture factories and depots where furniture is stored and distributed; there is a glass works in Ibrox which deals in sheet glass. Craigton{Industrial}Estate has some light industries. In Shieldhall there are also some light{industries} and a food processing plant. The biggest decline in any one{industry} has been that of the shipbuilders. During the war 17,000 men worked there; now{17%}of that figure work there, though more are being taken on.
